Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests
   Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today with foreign guests who participated in the exhibition of books on the greatness of the three generals of Mt. Paektu and works representing reverence for them and the joint TV meeting held to celebrate the 60th birthday of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Adherents to Juche Idea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Adherents to Juche Idea
   Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today met and had a friendly talk at the Mansudae Assembly Hall with Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, its Secretary General Kenichi Ogami, Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, Baguma Isoke, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and directors of the board of the IIJI and heads of the delegations of the study of the Juche idea on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the DPRK.

   Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Australia-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society headed by Raymond Ferguson and a friendship delegation of Donggang City of Liaoning Province, China, headed by Song Shuguan, general manager of the Chaoyuan Fish Breeding Company Ltd., arrived here on Sept. 7 to participate in the celebrations of the 60th birthday of the DPRK.
